case.title: Cute Blk man Looking for SBF living in bedstuy/bushwick (Brooklyn)
case.text:
Mature Average Hieght 5'11" Educated Blk Brown skin, clean cut athletic build No kids no drama gentlemen in brooklyn iso SBF.especially those single,drama free disease free seeking a friend who lives around that area.I live off stuyesvant ave Dont be shy send me a message and see where it goes from there. Looking forward to an ongoing friendship.
Only bed stuy/bushwick area females
